title: S15 Ep83: Supernatural News/Parashare:  Paranormal Playthings Edition
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare:  Paranormal Playthings Edition
description:
Darkness Radio is back with Supernatural News Paranormal Playthings Edition!



Dave & Tim discuss a wide array of paranormal topics today with news from around the world PLUS they read your emailed accounts of supernatural encounters.

We begin with a look at Haunted and Creepy Dolls with a few stories and revisit a classic Theater of the Mind story, then a look at 2 new horror movies, Nocturne and Evil Eye from Blumhouse, headless ghosts, paranormal priests, Science looks at UFOs and so much more!



Call in and share your paranormal encounters 651-300-4977
Or email in your stories to Dave@DarknessRadio.com

For some of the best Paranormal Swag visit our Amazon Store here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave

CREEPY DOLL CONTEST INFO: https://creepydolls.olmstedhistory.com/
